title: [Large-scale] Science Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using Mobile-Based E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners study science theories and engage in interactive assignments via mobile devices and LMS, while instructors provide feedback by uploading learning materials and assessment resources

learning_goals: Learners can explain core science concepts with over 80% accuracy using a mobile e-learning system
Learners can establish improvement plans for learning weaknesses at least three times through weekly quizzes and a feedback system
Learners can participate in peer assessment tasks with over 90% engagement using collaboration features
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
